item.title: Exploration and try new ideas are a awesome way to learn
item.description: Looking at Hacker news, i saw a post call my attention. I rewrote in Crystal my tool to quickly create Kubernetes clusters in Hetzner And it called my attention for several factors: Create tooling that envolve K8S. Using a not too mainstream language (Crystal). A useful use case inside a real cloud vendor (Hetzner). I liked the insights that it give for me and the execution plan from the author, a lot of details need to be managed for the tool work.
